department.dept_long_name: Division of Engineering and Applied Sciences

course.title: Medical Device Design
course.faculty_text: Conor J. Walsh and Donal Padraic Holland
course.description: Project-based course on the design of medical devices to address needs identified by hospital-based clinicians. Students work in teams with physicians to develop a novel device. The design process includes: needs finding; problem identification; prior art searches; strategy and concept generation; estimation; sketching; sketch modeling; machine elements, ergonomics and prototyping.
course.prerequisites: Engineering Sciences 51 or machine design experience. Graduate course, but open to qualified junior and senior undergraduates.
